verbs.description: [V: Joining] [ARG1: former Presidents George H.W. Bush and George W. Bush] [ARGM-LOC: at Barbara Bush 's funeral] will be current first lady Melania Trump , as well as Bill and Hillary Clinton and Barack and Michelle Obama .
